description: Marker control label refinement - Show keyboard label by default for enabled sections, close icon on hover, always show close for disabled sections

userStories.title: Show keyboard label as default for enabled sections
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the keyboard mapping number (1-9) as the default control above enabled section markers.
acceptanceCriteria: Enabled sections show numeric keyboard label (1-9) above the left marker
Close (×) icon is NOT visible by default for enabled sections
Label is clearly readable and centered above the marker line
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Show close icon on hover for enabled sections
userStories.description: As a user, I want the close icon to appear when I hover over the keyboard label, so I can delete the marker.
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering over the keyboard label area reveals the close (×) icon
The keyboard label is hidden when close icon is shown (only one visible at a time)
Transition uses quick fade (100-150ms opacity transition)
When hover ends, close icon fades out and keyboard label fades back in
Close icon changes to red/danger color (e.g. text-red-500) on hover
Clicking close icon deletes the marker
Clicking keyboard label does NOT trigger deletion
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Always show close icon for disabled sections
userStories.description: As a user, I want disabled sections to always show the close icon so I can distinguish them from enabled sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Disabled sections show close (×) icon by default (not keyboard label)
No keyboard mapping number is ever shown for disabled sections
Close icon remains visible on hover (no swap behavior for disabled)
Close icon still changes to red/danger color on hover
Cursor changes to not-allowed when hovering disabled marker control area
Clicking close icon still deletes the marker
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Ensure stable hover interactions
userStories.description: As a user, I want hover transitions to be stable without flickering.
acceptanceCriteria: No flickering when transitioning between label and close icon
Hover area is the entire control container (not just the icon/label element)
Hover state maintained while mouse is within control area
Control does not interfere with marker drag behavior on waveform below
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
